value:
$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|It all comes down to this. Who
will cling to life, Alfonse? Me...
or you?$k$pI rigged that floor well. Trapped
under all this rubble, how long can
you survive?$k$pWhat?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ugh... That hurt!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Sharena...?$k$pNo... Sharena was killed... Hel
killed her. You...aren't real...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You... You really are my brother,
aren't you?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Oh... You're the Sharena from the
other world.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Yes.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|You're nothing more than a stranger
to me. I can kill you whenever I
please.$k$pBut if my sister were here, what
would she say to that?$k$p"Stop this, Alfonse!" Yes, for a start...$k$p"If you have to hurt these people to
bring me back—" No, indeed. She
would not be pleased.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Líf...$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Sharena... Have I done wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I am sorry. I can't predict what your
Sharena might say. I don't know the
Sharena you know...$k$pI am quite sure that no one knows her
better than you.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Only me...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes—as well as I know my brother.
I know he is kind, and he understands
my feelings better than I do...$k$pYou must already know the answer.
You know what your Sharena
would say about all of this.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|You... You're right.$k$pI have known since the very
beginning, haven't I?$k$pI just couldn't accept it...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Sharena! Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Oh. Alfonse...you survived.$k$p

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|You... You predicted my trap and
wriggled your way out of it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I wasn't sure, but I had a sense
of what you might do. After all,
we're the same person.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|No matter how long you put it off,
you will die. All the living will die.
It is inescapable.$k$pBut before that happens...you must
taste defeat at my hand.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|He fled. Quickly—pursue him!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We must, yes. But...be wary. He
probably laid plans for his escape
long ago.$k$pWho knows what awaits us? We may
be ambushed or fall victim to traps.
Yet we have no choice but to follow.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I spoke with him. He... He really is
you. I could tell.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|*sigh*$k$p$Sbs150|
